00030 
00064 
00065 QuasiNewtonMethod::QuasiNewtonMethod(ObjectiveFunctional* newObjectiveFunctional)
00066 : TrainingAlgorithm(newObjectiveFunctional)
00067 {
00068    // Inverse Hessian approximation method
00069 
00070    inverseHessianApproximationMethod = BFGS;
00071 
00072    // Train rate method
00073 
00074    trainRateMethod = BrentMethod;
00075 
00076    // Training parameters 
00077 
00078    firstTrainRate = 1.0e-3;
00079    bracketingFactor = 1.5;
00080    trainRateTolerance = 1.0e-6;
00081    
00082    // Stopping criteria
00083 
00084    evaluationGoal = -1.0e99;
00085    gradientNormGoal = 0.0;
00086    maximumTime = 1.0e69;
00087    minimumImprovement = 0.0;
00088    maximumNumberOfEpochs = 100;
00089 
00090    // User stuff
00091 
00092    warningTrainRate = 1.0e6;
00093    errorTrainRate = 1.0e12;
00094    displayPeriod = 25; 
00095    
00096    reserveTrainingDirectionHistory = false;
00097    reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory = false;
00098    reserveTrainingRateHistory = false;
00099 }

00368 // void setFirstTrainRate(double) method

00377 
00378 void QuasiNewtonMethod::setFirstTrainRate(double newFirstTrainRate)
00379 { 
00380    // Control sentence (if debug)
00381 
00382    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00383 
00384    if(newFirstTrainRate <= 0.0) 
00385    {
00386       std::cerr << std::endl
00387                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
00388                 << "void setFirstTrainRate(double) method." << std::endl
00389                 << "Initial train rate must be greater than 0." << std::endl
00390                 << std::endl;
00391 
00392       exit(1);
00393    }
00394 
00395    #endif
00396 
00397    // Set first train rate
00398 
00399    firstTrainRate = newFirstTrainRate;
00400 }

00645 
00646 // double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
00647 
00658  
00659 double QuasiNewtonMethod::calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate(double initialTrainRate, double evaluation,
00660 Vector<double> freeParameters, Vector<double> trainDirection)
00661 {
00662    double trainRate = 0.0;
00663 
00664    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00665 
00666    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();   
00667 
00668    Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters);
00669 
00670    double a = 0.0;
00671    double evaluationA = 0.0;
00672    double b = 0.0;
00673    double evaluationB = 0.0;
00674 
00675    double c = 0.0;   
00676    double evaluationC = 0.0;
00677    double d = 0.0;   
00678    double evaluationD = 0.0;
00679 
00680    double tau = (3.0-sqrt(5.0))/2.0; // 0.382
00681 
00682    // Start golden section search
00683 
00684    // Set initial a point
00685 
00686    a = 0.0;
00687 
00688    // Calculate evaluation for a
00689 
00690    evaluationA = evaluation;
00691 
00692    // Set initial b point
00693 
00694    b = initialTrainRate;
00695 
00696    // Calculate evaluation for b
00697 
00698    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
00699 
00700    evaluationB = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00701 
00702    // Find initial interval where minimum evaluation occurs
00703 
00704    double oldB = b;
00705    double oldEvaluationB = evaluationB;   
00706 
00707    while(evaluationA > evaluationB)
00708    {
00709       // Reset a point and corresponding evaluation 
00710 
00711       if(b != initialTrainRate)
00712       {
00713          a = oldB;
00714          evaluationA = oldEvaluationB;
00715       }      
00716 
00717       // Set new b
00718 
00719       oldB = b;
00720       b *= bracketingFactor;
00721 
00722       if(b >= errorTrainRate)
00723       {
00724          std::cerr << std::endl
00725                    << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
00726                    << "double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate"
00727                    << "(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00728                    << "Unable to bracket a minimum." << std::endl
00729                    << std::endl;
00730                    
00731          exit(1);
00732       }
00733       else if(display && (b >= warningTrainRate))
00734       {
00735          std::cout << std::endl
00736                    << "Flood Warning: Train rate is " << b
00737                    << std::endl;
00738       }
00739 
00740       // Calculate evaluation for new b
00741 
00742       potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
00743       
00744       oldEvaluationB = evaluationB;
00745 
00746       evaluationB = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00747    }
00748 
00749    // Initialize c and d (interior points for line minimization)
00750 
00751    // Initialize c point
00752 
00753    c = a + tau*(b-a);
00754 
00755    // Calculate evaluation for c
00756 
00757    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*c;
00758 
00759    evaluationC = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00760 
00761    // Initialize d point
00762 
00763    d = b - tau*(b-a);
00764 
00765    // Calculate evaluation for d
00766 
00767    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*d;
00768 
00769    evaluationD = objectiveFunctional
00770    ->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00771 
00772    // Reduce the interval with the golden section algorithm
00773 
00774    while(b-a > trainRateTolerance)
00775    {
00776       Vector<double> evaluationVectorLeft(3);
00777       evaluationVectorLeft[0] = evaluationA;
00778       evaluationVectorLeft[1] = evaluationC;
00779       evaluationVectorLeft[2] = evaluationD;
00780 
00781       double minimumEvaluationLeft = evaluationVectorLeft.calculateMinimum();
00782 
00783       Vector<double> evaluationVectorRight(3);
00784       evaluationVectorRight[0] = evaluationB;
00785       evaluationVectorRight[1] = evaluationC;
00786       evaluationVectorRight[2] = evaluationD;
00787 
00788       double minimumEvaluationRight = evaluationVectorRight.calculateMinimum();
00789 
00790       if((evaluationC < evaluationD && evaluationB >= minimumEvaluationLeft)
00791       || (evaluationA <  minimumEvaluationRight))
00792 
00793       // There is a minimum between a and b
00794       {
00795          b=d; 
00796          d=c; 
00797 
00798          evaluationB = evaluationD;
00799          evaluationD = evaluationC;
00800 
00801          // Set new c point
00802 
00803          c = a + tau*(b-a);
00804 
00805          // Calculate evaluation for new c
00806 
00807          potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*c;
00808 
00809          evaluationC = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00810       }
00811       else if((evaluationD < evaluationC && evaluationA >= minimumEvaluationRight)
00812       || (evaluationB < minimumEvaluationLeft))   
00813 
00814       // There is a minimum between c and b
00815       {
00816          a = c; 
00817          c = d; 
00818 
00819          evaluationA = evaluationC;
00820          evaluationC = evaluationD;
00821 
00822          // Set new d point
00823 
00824          d = b - tau*(b-a);
00825 
00826          // Calculate evaluation for new d
00827 
00828          potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*d;
00829 
00830          evaluationD = objectiveFunctional
00831          ->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00832       }
00833       else
00834       {
00835          std::cerr << std::endl
00836                    << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
00837                    << "double calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate "
00838                    << "(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00839                    << "Unable to find were the minimum is." << std::endl
00840                    << std::endl;
00841 
00842          exit(1);
00843       }
00844    }
00845 
00846    // Get minimum evaluation and train rate among points A, B, C and D
00847 
00848    double minimumEvaluation = evaluation;
00849 
00850    if(evaluationA < minimumEvaluation)
00851    {
00852       minimumEvaluation  = evaluationA;
00853       trainRate = a;
00854    }
00855    else if(evaluationB < minimumEvaluation)
00856    {
00857       minimumEvaluation = evaluationB;
00858       trainRate = b;
00859    }
00860    else if(evaluationC < minimumEvaluation)
00861    {
00862       minimumEvaluation = evaluationC;
00863       trainRate = c;
00864    }
00865    else if(evaluationD < minimumEvaluation)
00866    {
00867       minimumEvaluation = evaluationD;
00868       trainRate = d;
00869    }
00870 
00871    return(trainRate);
00872 }
00873 
00874 
00875 // double calculateBrentMethodTrainRate(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method
00876 
00887 
00888 double QuasiNewtonMethod::calculateBrentMethodTrainRate(double initialTrainRate, double evaluation,
00889 Vector<double> freeParameters, Vector<double> trainDirection)
00890 {
00891    double trainRate = 0.0;
00892 
00893    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron 
00894    = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
00895 
00896    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();   
00897 
00898    Vector<double> potentialFreeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters);
00899 
00900    double a = 0.0;
00901    double evaluationA = 0.0;
00902    double b = 0.0;
00903    double evaluationB = 0.0;
00904 
00905    double u = 0.0;
00906    double evaluationU = 0.0;
00907    double v = 0.0;
00908    double evaluationV = 0.0;
00909    double w = 0.0;
00910    double evaluationW = 0.0;
00911    double x = 0.0;
00912    double evaluationX = 0.0;
00913 
00914    double tau = (3.0-sqrt(5.0))/2.0; // 0.382
00915 
00916    // Start Brent search
00917 
00918    // Set initial a point
00919 
00920    a = 0.0;
00921 
00922    // Calculate evaluation for a
00923 
00924    evaluationA = evaluation;
00925 
00926    // Set initial b point
00927 
00928    b = initialTrainRate;
00929 
00930    // Calculate evaluation for b
00931 
00932    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
00933 
00934    evaluationB = objectiveFunctional
00935    ->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00936 
00937    // Find initial interval where minimum evaluation occurs
00938 
00939    double oldB = b;
00940    double oldEvaluationB = evaluationB;
00941 
00942    while(evaluationA >= evaluationB)
00943    {
00944       // Reset a point and corresponding evaluation 
00945 
00946       if(b != initialTrainRate)
00947       {
00948          a = oldB;
00949          evaluationA = oldEvaluationB;
00950       }      
00951 
00952       // Set new b
00953 
00954       oldB = b;
00955       b *= bracketingFactor;
00956 
00957       if(b >= errorTrainRate)
00958       {
00959          std::cerr << std::endl
00960                    << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
00961                    << "double calculateBrentMethodTrainRate"
00962                    << "(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
00963                    << "Unable to bracket a minimum." << std::endl;
00964                    
00965          exit(1);
00966       }
00967       else if(display && (b >= warningTrainRate))
00968       {
00969          std::cout << std::endl
00970                    << "Flood Warning: Train rate is  " << b
00971                    << std::endl;
00972       } 
00973 
00974       // Calculate evaluation for new b
00975 
00976       potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*b;
00977   
00978       oldEvaluationB = evaluationB;
00979    
00980       evaluationB = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00981    }
00982 
00983    // Get itermediate point V
00984 
00985    v = a + tau*(b-a);
00986 
00987    // Calculate evaluation for V
00988 
00989    potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*v;
00990 
00991    evaluationV = objectiveFunctional->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
00992 
00993    // Set initial W and X points
00994 
00995    w = v;
00996    evaluationW = evaluationV;
00997 
00998    x = v;
00999    evaluationX = evaluationV;
01000 
01001    // Maximum and minimum intervals ???
01002 
01003    bool goldenSection = false;
01004 
01005    // Reduce the interval
01006 
01007    while(b-a > trainRateTolerance)
01008    {
01009       // Quadratic interpolation
01010 
01011       if(w != x && w != v && x != v) // Can construct parabola 
01012       {
01013          // zz vector
01014 
01015          Vector<double> trainRateVector(3);
01016          trainRateVector[0] = v;
01017          trainRateVector[1] = w;
01018          trainRateVector[2] = x;
01019 
01020          std::sort(trainRateVector.begin(), trainRateVector.end(), std::less<double>());
01021 
01022          // pp vector
01023 
01024          Vector<double> evaluationVector(3);
01025 
01026          for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
01027          {
01028             if(trainRateVector[i] == v)
01029             {
01030                evaluationVector[i] = evaluationV;
01031             }
01032             else if(trainRateVector[i] == w)
01033             {
01034                trainRateVector[i] = evaluationW;
01035             }
01036             else if(trainRateVector[i] == x)
01037             {
01038                trainRateVector[i] = evaluationX;
01039             }
01040             else
01041             {
01042                std::cerr << std::endl
01043                          << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
01044                          << "double calculateBrentMethodTrainRate" << std::endl
01045                          << "(double, double, Vector<double>, Vector<double>) method." << std::endl
01046                          << "Unable to construct train rate and evaluation vectors right." << std::endl 
01047                          << std::endl;
01048 
01049                exit(1);
01050             }
01051          }
01052 
01053          // xStar is the minimum of the parabola through the three train rate points
01054 
01055          double numerator 
01056          = (pow(trainRateVector[2],2) - pow(trainRateVector[1],2))*evaluationVector[0]
01057          + (pow(trainRateVector[1],2) - pow(trainRateVector[0],2))*evaluationVector[2]
01058          + (pow(trainRateVector[0],2) - pow(trainRateVector[2],2))*evaluationVector[1];
01059 
01060          double denominator
01061          = (trainRateVector[2] - trainRateVector[1])*evaluationVector[0]
01062          + (trainRateVector[1] - trainRateVector[0])*evaluationVector[2]
01063          + (trainRateVector[0] - trainRateVector[2])*evaluationVector[1];
01064 
01065          double xStar = 0.5*numerator/denominator;
01066 
01067          if(xStar < b && a < xStar) // xStar is in [a,b]
01068          {
01069             u = xStar;
01070 
01071             // Good, no need to perform golden section
01072 
01073             goldenSection = false;
01074          }
01075          else // xStar is not in [a,b]
01076          {
01077             // Bad, need to perform golden section
01078 
01079             goldenSection = true;
01080          }
01081       }
01082       else // Cannot construct parabola
01083       {
01084          // Bad, need to perform golden section
01085 
01086          goldenSection = true;
01087       }
01088 
01089       //
01090       // Golden section
01091       //
01092 
01093       if(goldenSection == true)
01094       {
01095          if(x >= (a+b)/2.0)
01096          {
01097             u = x-tau*(x-a);
01098          }
01099          else
01100          {
01101             u = x+tau*(b-x);
01102          }
01103       }
01104 
01105       // Calculate evaluation for U
01106 
01107       potentialFreeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*u;
01108 
01109       evaluationU = objectiveFunctional
01110       ->calculatePotentialEvaluation(potentialFreeParameters);
01111 
01112       // Update points
01113 
01114       if(evaluationU <= evaluationX)
01115       {
01116          if(u < x)
01117          {
01118             b = x;
01119             evaluationB = evaluationX;
01120          }
01121          else
01122          {
01123             a = x;
01124             evaluationA = evaluationX;
01125          }
01126 
01127          v = w; 
01128          evaluationV = evaluationW;
01129 
01130          w = x;
01131          evaluationW = evaluationX;
01132 
01133          x = u; 
01134          evaluationX = evaluationU;
01135       }
01136       else
01137       {
01138          if(u < x)
01139          {
01140             a = u;
01141             evaluationA = evaluationU;
01142          }
01143          else
01144          {
01145             b = u;
01146             evaluationB = evaluationU;
01147          }
01148 
01149          if((evaluationU <= evaluationW) || (w == x))
01150          {
01151              v = w; 
01152              evaluationV = evaluationW;
01153 
01154              w = u; 
01155              evaluationW = evaluationU;
01156          }
01157          else if((evaluationU <= evaluationV) || (v == x) || (v == w))
01158          {
01159             v = u; 
01160             evaluationV = evaluationU;
01161          }
01162       }
01163    } // while loop 
01164 
01165    // Get minimum evaluation and train rate among points A, B, V, W and X
01166 
01167    double minimumEvaluation = evaluation;
01168 
01169    if(evaluationA <= minimumEvaluation)
01170    {
01171       minimumEvaluation = evaluationA;
01172       trainRate = a;
01173    }
01174    else if(evaluationB <= minimumEvaluation)
01175    {
01176       minimumEvaluation = evaluationB;
01177       trainRate = b;
01178    } 
01179    else if(evaluationV <= minimumEvaluation)
01180    {
01181       minimumEvaluation = evaluationV;
01182       trainRate = v;
01183    }
01184    else if(evaluationW <= minimumEvaluation)
01185    {
01186       minimumEvaluation = evaluationW;
01187       trainRate = w;
01188    }
01189    else if(evaluationX <= minimumEvaluation)
01190    {
01191       minimumEvaluation = evaluationX;
01192       trainRate = x;
01193    }
01194 
01195    return(trainRate);
01196 }
01197 
01198 
01199 
01200 // void train(void) method
01201 
01208 
01209 void QuasiNewtonMethod::train(void)
01210 {
01211    // Control sentence (if debug)
01212 
01213    #ifndef NDEBUG 
01214 
01215    if(objectiveFunctional == NULL)
01216    {
01217       std::cerr << std::endl
01218                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
01219                 << "void train(void) method." << std::endl
01220                 << "Pointer to objective functional object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
01221                 << std::endl;
01222 
01223         exit(1);
01224 
01225    }
01226 
01227    #endif
01228 
01229    if(display)
01230    {
01231       std::cout << std::endl
01232                 << "Training with quasi-Newton method..." 
01233                 << std::endl;
01234    }
01235      
01236    // Multilayer perceptron stuff
01237 
01238    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
01239 
01240    int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();   
01241 
01242    // Initial state
01243 
01244    // Resize training history
01245 
01246    resizeTrainingHistory(1+maximumNumberOfEpochs);
01247 
01248    // Free parameters
01249 
01250    Vector<double> freeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getFreeParameters();
01251 
01252    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
01253    {
01254       freeParametersHistory.setRow(0, freeParameters);                                
01255    }
01256 
01257    // Free parameters norm
01258 
01259    double freeParametersNorm = freeParameters.calculateNorm();
01260 
01261    if(display && (freeParametersNorm >= warningFreeParametersNorm))
01262    {
01263       std::cout << std::endl
01264                 << "Flood Warning: Initial free parameters norm is " << freeParametersNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01265    }
01266 
01267    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
01268    {
01269       freeParametersNormHistory[0] = freeParametersNorm;                                
01270    }
01271 
01272    // Set beginning training time 
01273 
01274    time_t beginningTime, currentTime;
01275    double elapsedTime = 0.0;
01276 
01277    time(&beginningTime);
01278 
01279 
01280    // Initial objective function evaluation
01281    
01282    double evaluation = objectiveFunctional->calculateEvaluation();
01283 
01284    // Initial objective function gradient
01285 
01286    Vector<double> gradient = objectiveFunctional->calculateGradient();
01287 
01288    double gradientNorm = gradient.calculateNorm();
01289 
01290    if(display && (gradientNorm >= warningGradientNorm))
01291    {
01292       std::cout << std::endl
01293                 << "Flood Warning: Gradient norm is " << gradientNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01294    }
01295 
01296    // Initial elapsed time
01297    
01298    time(&currentTime);
01299    elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01300 
01301    // Free parameters history 
01302 
01303    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
01304    {
01305       freeParametersHistory.setRow(0, freeParameters);   
01306    }
01307 
01308    // Free parameters norm history 
01309 
01310    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
01311    {
01312      freeParametersNormHistory[0] = freeParametersNorm;
01313    }
01314 
01315    // Evaluation history
01316 
01317    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
01318    {
01319        evaluationHistory[0] = evaluation;
01320    }
01321 
01322    // Gradient norm history
01323 
01324    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
01325    {
01326       gradientNormHistory[0] = gradientNorm;
01327    }
01328 
01329 
01330    // Stopping criteria
01331 
01332    if(evaluation <= evaluationGoal)
01333    {
01334       if(display)
01335       {          
01336          std::cout << std::endl
01337                    << "Initial evaluation is less than goal." << std::endl;
01338          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;
01339 
01340          std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01341 
01342          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;         
01343          std::cout << "Initial gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01344 
01345          objectiveFunctional->print();
01346       }
01347 
01348       // Resize training history
01349 
01350       resizeTrainingHistory(1);
01351 
01352       return;
01353    }
01354    else if(gradientNorm <= gradientNormGoal)
01355    {  
01356       if(display)
01357       {        
01358          std::cout << std::endl;
01359          std::cout << "Initial gradient norm is less than goal." << std::endl;
01360 
01361          time(&currentTime);
01362          elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01363 
01364          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;
01365 
01366          std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01367  
01368          std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01369          std::cout << "Initial gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01370 
01371          objectiveFunctional->print();
01372       }
01373 
01374       // Resize training history
01375 
01376       resizeTrainingHistory(1);
01377 
01378       return;
01379    }
01380    else
01381    {
01382       if(display)
01383       {
01384           std::cout << std::endl
01385                     << "Epoch 0;"  << std::endl;
01386 
01387           std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;         
01388 
01389           std::cout << "Initial parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01390 
01391           std::cout << "Initial evaluation: " <<  evaluation << std::endl
01392                     << "Initial gradient norm: " <<  gradientNorm << std::endl;      
01393 
01394          objectiveFunctional->print();         
01395       }
01396    }
01397 
01398    // Initial objective function hessian
01399 
01400    Matrix<double> inverseHessianApproximation(numberOfFreeParameters, numberOfFreeParameters);
01401 
01402    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfFreeParameters; i++)
01403    {
01404       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfFreeParameters; j++)
01405       {   
01406          if(i == j)
01407          {
01408             inverseHessianApproximation[i][j] = 1.0;     
01409          }
01410       }                           
01411    }                   
01412 
01413    // Train direction stuff
01414 
01415    Vector<double> trainDirection(numberOfFreeParameters);
01416    Vector<double> oldFreeParameters(numberOfFreeParameters);
01417    Vector<double> oldGradient(numberOfFreeParameters);
01418    Matrix<double> oldInverseHessianApproximation(numberOfFreeParameters, numberOfFreeParameters);
01419    double slope = 0.0;
01420 
01421    // Train rate stuff
01422 
01423    double initialTrainRate = 0.0;
01424    double trainRate = 0.0;
01425    double oldTrainRate = 0.0;
01426 
01427    // Loop over epochs
01428 
01429    for(int epoch = 1; epoch <= maximumNumberOfEpochs; epoch++)
01430    {
01431       // Get train direction
01432 
01433       trainDirection = inverseHessianApproximation*gradient*(-1.0);      
01434 
01435       // Calculate slope
01436 
01437       slope = gradient.dot(trainDirection);
01438 
01439       // Check for a descent direction 
01440 
01441       if(slope >= 0.0)
01442       {
01443          //if(display)
01444          //{
01445          //   std::cout << std::endl
01446          //             << "Function slope is equal or greater than zero."
01447          //             << std::endl
01448          //             << "Train direction reset to negative gradient."
01449          //             << std::endl;
01450          //}
01451 
01452          // Reset train direction
01453 
01454          trainDirection = gradient*(-1.0);
01455       }
01456 
01457       // Get train rate
01458 
01459       // Get initial train rate
01460 
01461       if(epoch == 1)
01462       {
01463          initialTrainRate = firstTrainRate;
01464       }
01465       else
01466       {
01467          initialTrainRate = oldTrainRate;
01468       }
01469 
01470       // Get train rate
01471 
01472       switch(trainRateMethod)
01473       {
01474          case Fixed:
01475 
01476             trainRate = firstTrainRate;
01477 
01478          break;
01479 
01480          case GoldenSection:
01481 
01482             trainRate 
01483                         = calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate(initialTrainRate, evaluation, freeParameters, trainDirection);
01484 
01485          break;
01486 
01487          case BrentMethod:
01488 
01489             trainRate 
01490             = calculateBrentMethodTrainRate(initialTrainRate, evaluation, freeParameters, trainDirection);
01491 
01492          break;
01493       }
01494 
01495       // Train rate stopping criterium
01496 
01497       if(trainRate == 0.0)
01498       {
01499          if(epoch == 1)
01500          {
01501             std::cout << std::endl
01502                       << "Initital train rate is zero." << std::endl;  
01503 
01504             time(&currentTime);
01505             elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01506 
01507              std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;
01508 
01509              std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01510 
01511              std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01512              std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01513 
01514              objectiveFunctional->print();
01515 
01516              break;
01517          }
01518          else
01519          {
01520             //if(display)
01521             //{
01522             //   std::cout << std::endl
01523             //             << "Train rate is zero for a quasi-Newton train direction."
01524             //             << std::endl
01525             //             << "Train direction reset to negative gradient." << std::endl
01526             //             << "Initial train rate reset to first train rate." << std::endl;
01527             //}
01528 
01529             // Reset train direction
01530 
01531             trainDirection = gradient*(-1.0);
01532 
01533             // Get train rate
01534 
01535             switch(trainRateMethod)
01536             {
01537                case Fixed:
01538 
01539                   trainRate = firstTrainRate;
01540 
01541                break;
01542 
01543                case GoldenSection:
01544 
01545                   trainRate = calculateGoldenSectionTrainRate
01546                   (firstTrainRate, evaluation, freeParameters, trainDirection);
01547 
01548                break;
01549 
01550                case BrentMethod:
01551  
01552                   trainRate = calculateBrentMethodTrainRate
01553                   (firstTrainRate, evaluation, freeParameters, trainDirection);
01554 
01555                break;
01556             }
01557      
01558             if(trainRate == 0.0)
01559              {
01560                if(display)
01561                {
01562                   std::cout << std::endl
01563                             << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01564                             << "Train rate is zero for gradient descent train direction." << std::endl;
01565 
01566                   // Get elapsed time
01567 
01568                   time(&currentTime);
01569                   elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01570 
01571                   std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;
01572 
01573                   std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01574 
01575                   std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01576                   std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01577 
01578                   objectiveFunctional->print();
01579                }
01580 
01581                // Resize training history
01582 
01583                resizeTrainingHistory(epoch);
01584  
01585               break;
01586            }
01587         }
01588      }
01589 
01590       // Get new free parameters
01591 
01592       oldFreeParameters = freeParameters;
01593 
01594       freeParameters = freeParameters + trainDirection*trainRate;
01595 
01596       freeParametersNorm = freeParameters.calculateNorm();
01597 
01598       if(display && (freeParametersNorm >= warningFreeParametersNorm))
01599       {
01600          std::cout << std::endl
01601                    << "Flood Warning: Free parameters norm is " << freeParametersNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01602       }
01603       
01604       // Set new free parameters
01605 
01606       multilayerPerceptron->setFreeParameters(freeParameters);
01607 
01608       // Free parameters history 
01609 
01610       if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
01611       {
01612          freeParametersHistory.setRow(epoch, freeParameters);
01613       }
01614 
01615       // Free parameters norm history 
01616 
01617       if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
01618       {
01619          freeParametersNormHistory[epoch] = freeParametersNorm;
01620       }
01621 
01622       // Objective functional evaluation
01623  
01624       double oldEvaluation = evaluation;
01625  
01626       evaluation = objectiveFunctional->calculateEvaluation();
01627 
01628       // Objective function gradient
01629 
01630       oldGradient = gradient;
01631 
01632       gradient = objectiveFunctional->calculateGradient();
01633 
01634       gradientNorm = gradient.calculateNorm();
01635 
01636       if(display && (gradientNorm >= warningGradientNorm))
01637       {
01638          std::cout << std::endl
01639                    << "Flood Warning: Gradient norm is " << gradientNorm << "." << std::endl;          
01640       }
01641 
01642       // Evaluation history
01643 
01644       if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
01645       {
01646          evaluationHistory[epoch] = evaluation;
01647       }
01648 
01649       // Gradient norm history
01650 
01651       if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
01652       {
01653          gradientNormHistory[epoch] = gradientNorm;
01654       }
01655 
01656       // Objective function Hessian approximation
01657 
01658       oldInverseHessianApproximation = inverseHessianApproximation;
01659 
01660       switch(inverseHessianApproximationMethod)
01661       {
01662          case DFP:
01663              {
01664             inverseHessianApproximation 
01665             = objectiveFunctional->calculateDFPInverseHessianApproximation
01666             (oldFreeParameters, oldGradient, oldInverseHessianApproximation, 
01667             freeParameters, gradient);
01668                  }//end dfp
01669 
01670          break;
01671 
01672          case BFGS:
01673              {
01674             inverseHessianApproximation 
01675             = objectiveFunctional->calculateBFGSInverseHessianApproximation
01676             (oldFreeParameters, oldGradient, oldInverseHessianApproximation, 
01677             freeParameters, gradient);
01678                  }//end bfgs
01679 
01680          break;
01681       }//end switch
01682 
01683       // Stopping Criteria
01684 
01685       // Evaluation goal 
01686 
01687       if(evaluation <= evaluationGoal)
01688       {
01689          if(display)
01690          {
01691             std::cout << std::endl
01692                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01693                       << "Evaluation goal reached." << std::endl;
01694 
01695             time(&currentTime);
01696             elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01697             
01698             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;
01699 
01700             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01701 
01702             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01703             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;                       
01704 
01705             objectiveFunctional->print();
01706          }
01707 
01708          // Resize training history
01709          
01710          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01711           
01712          break;
01713       }
01714 
01715       // Gradient norm goal 
01716 
01717       if(gradientNorm <= gradientNormGoal)
01718       {
01719          if(display)
01720          {
01721             std::cout << std::endl
01722                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01723                       << "Gradient norm goal reached."
01724                       << std::endl;  
01725 
01726             time(&currentTime);
01727             elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01728 
01729             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;
01730 
01731             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01732 
01733             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01734             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01735 
01736             objectiveFunctional->print();                       
01737          }
01738 
01739          // Resize training history
01740          
01741          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01742 
01743          break;
01744       }
01745 
01746       // Minimum evaluation improvement 
01747 
01748       double improvement = fabs(evaluation - oldEvaluation);
01749 
01750       if(improvement < minimumImprovement)
01751       {
01752          if(display)
01753          {
01754             std::cout << std::endl
01755                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01756                       << "Minimum evaluation improvement reached."
01757                       << std::endl;
01758 
01759             time(&currentTime);
01760             elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01761 
01762             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime  << std::endl;
01763   
01764             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01765 
01766             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01767             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01768 
01769             objectiveFunctional->print();                       
01770          }
01771 
01772          // Resize training history
01773          
01774          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01775 
01776          break;
01777       }
01778 
01779       // Maximum optimization time
01780 
01781       time(&currentTime);
01782       elapsedTime = difftime(currentTime, beginningTime);
01783 
01784       if(elapsedTime >= maximumTime)
01785       {
01786          if(display)
01787          {
01788             std::cout << std::endl
01789                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01790                       << "Maximum training time reached."
01791                       << std::endl;
01792 
01793             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;           
01794 
01795             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01796 
01797             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01798             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01799 
01800             objectiveFunctional->print();   
01801          }
01802 
01803          // Resize training history
01804          
01805          resizeTrainingHistory(1+epoch);
01806 
01807          break;
01808       }
01809 
01810       // Maximum number of epochs
01811 
01812       if(epoch == maximumNumberOfEpochs)
01813       {
01814          if(display)
01815          {
01816             std::cout << std::endl
01817                       << "Epoch " << epoch << ": "
01818                       << "Maximum number of epochs reached."
01819                       << std::endl;
01820 
01821             std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;            
01822 
01823             std::cout << "Final parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01824 
01825             std::cout << "Final evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01826             std::cout << "Final gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01827 
01828             objectiveFunctional->print();
01829          }
01830 
01831          break;
01832       }
01833 
01834       // Progress
01835 
01836       if(display && epoch % displayPeriod == 0)
01837       {
01838          std::cout << std::endl
01839                    << "Epoch " << epoch << ";" << std::endl;
01840 
01841          std::cout << "Elapsed time: " << elapsedTime << std::endl;         
01842 
01843          std::cout << "Parameters norm: " << freeParametersNorm << std::endl;
01844 
01845          std::cout << "Evaluation: " << evaluation << std::endl;
01846          std::cout << "Gradient norm: " << gradientNorm << std::endl;
01847          
01848          objectiveFunctional->print();              
01849       }
01850 
01851       // Update train rate stuff
01852 
01853       oldTrainRate = trainRate;
01854    }
01855 }
01856 
01857 
01858 // void print(void) method
01859 
01901 
01902 
01903 void QuasiNewtonMethod::print(void)
01904 {
01905    std::cout << std::endl
01906              << "Quasi-Newton Method Object." << std::endl; 
01907 
01908    // Training operators
01909 
01910    // Inverse Hessian approximation method
01911 
01912    std::cout << "Inverse Hessian approximation method:" << std::endl;
01913 
01914    if(inverseHessianApproximationMethod == DFP)
01915    {
01916       std::cout << "DFP" << std::endl;
01917    }
01918    else if(inverseHessianApproximationMethod == BFGS)
01919    {
01920       std::cout << "BFGS" << std::endl;
01921    }
01922 
01923    // Train rate method
01924 
01925    std::cout << "Train rate method:" << std::endl;
01926 
01927    if(trainRateMethod == Fixed)
01928    {
01929       std::cout << "Fixed" << std::endl;
01930    }
01931    else if(trainRateMethod == GoldenSection)
01932    {
01933       std::cout << "Golden section" << std::endl;
01934    }
01935    else if(trainRateMethod == BrentMethod)
01936    {
01937       std::cout << "Brent method" << std::endl;
01938    }
01939 
01940    // Training parameters
01941 
01942    std::cout << "First train rate: " << std::endl 
01943              << firstTrainRate << std::endl
01944              << "Train rate tolerance: " << std::endl
01945              << trainRateTolerance << std::endl;
01946 
01947    // Stopping criteria
01948 
01949    std::cout << "Evaluation goal: " << std::endl
01950              << evaluationGoal << std::endl
01951              << "Gradient norm goal:" << std::endl 
01952              << gradientNormGoal <<std::endl
01953              << "Maximum time: " << std::endl
01954              << maximumTime << std::endl
01955              << "Maximum number of epochs: " << std::endl
01956              << maximumNumberOfEpochs << std::endl; 
01957 
01958    // User stuff
01959 
01960    std::cout << "Warning train rate: " << std::endl
01961              << warningTrainRate << std::endl
01962              << "Error train rate: " << std::endl
01963              << errorTrainRate << std::endl 
01964              << "Display: " << std::endl
01965              << display << std::endl 
01966              << "Display period: " << std::endl
01967              << displayPeriod << std::endl 
01968              << std::endl;
01969 
01970    std::cout << "Reserve elapsed time history:" << std::endl
01971              << reserveElapsedTimeHistory << std::endl 
01972              << "Reserve free parameters history:" << std::endl
01973              << reserveFreeParametersHistory << std::endl 
01974              << "Reserve free parameters norm history:" << std::endl
01975              << reserveFreeParametersNormHistory << std::endl 
01976              << "Reserve evaluation history:" << std::endl
01977              << reserveEvaluationHistory << std::endl 
01978              << "Reserve gradient history:" << std::endl
01979              << reserveGradientHistory << std::endl 
01980              << "Reserve gradient norm history:" << std::endl
01981              << reserveGradientNormHistory << std::endl 
01982              << "Reserve training direction history:" << std::endl
01983              << reserveTrainingDirectionHistory << std::endl 
01984              << "Reserve training direction norm history:" << std::endl
01985              << reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory << std::endl 
01986              << "Reserve training rate history:"  << std::endl
01987              << reserveTrainingRateHistory << std::endl;
01988 }

02198 
02199 void QuasiNewtonMethod::load(char* filename)
02200 {
02201    // File
02202 
02203    std::fstream file;
02204 
02205    file.open(filename, std::ios::in);
02206 
02207    if(!file.is_open())
02208    {
02209       std::cout << std::endl
02210                 << "Flood Error QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
02211                                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02212                 << "Cannot open quasi-Newton method object data file."  << std::endl;
02213 
02214       exit(1);
02215    }
02216    else
02217    {
02218       if(display)
02219       {
02220          std::cout << std::endl
02221                    << "Loading quasi-Newton method object from data file..."  
02222                    << std::endl;
02223       }
02224    }
02225 
02226    std::string word;
02227 
02228    // Training operators
02229 
02230    // Inverse Hessian approximation method
02231 
02232    while(word != "InverseHessianApproximationMethod:")
02233    {
02234       file >> word;
02235    }
02236 
02237    file >> word;
02238 
02239    if(word == "DFP")
02240    {
02241       inverseHessianApproximationMethod = DFP;
02242    }
02243    else if(word == "BFGS")
02244    {
02245       inverseHessianApproximationMethod = BFGS;
02246    }
02247    else
02248    {
02249       std::cerr << std::endl
02250                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
02251                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02252                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02253 
02254       exit(1);   
02255    }
02256 
02257    // Train rate method
02258 
02259    file >> word;
02260 
02261    if(word != "TrainRateMethod:")
02262    {
02263       std::cerr << std::endl
02264                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
02265                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02266                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02267 
02268       exit(1);   
02269    }
02270 
02271    file >> word;
02272 
02273    if(word == "Fixed")
02274    {
02275       trainRateMethod = Fixed;
02276    }
02277    else if(word == "GoldenSection")
02278    {
02279       trainRateMethod = GoldenSection;
02280    }
02281    else if(word == "Brent")
02282    {
02283       trainRateMethod = BrentMethod;
02284    }
02285    else
02286    {
02287       std::cerr << std::endl
02288                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
02289                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02290                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02291 
02292       exit(1);   
02293    }
02294 
02295    // Training parameters
02296 
02297    // First train rate
02298 
02299    file >> word;
02300 
02301    if(word != "FirstTrainRate:")
02302    {
02303       std::cerr << std::endl
02304                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
02305                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02306                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02307 
02308       exit(1);   
02309    }
02310 
02311    file >> firstTrainRate;
02312 
02313    // Train rate tolerance
02314 
02315    file >> word;
02316 
02317    if(word != "TrainRateTolerance:")
02318    {
02319       std::cerr << std::endl
02320                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
02321                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02322                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02323 
02324       exit(1);   
02325    }
02326 
02327    file >> trainRateTolerance;
02328 
02329    // Stopping criteria: 
02330 
02331    // Evaluation goal
02332 
02333    file >> word;
02334 
02335    if(word != "EvaluationGoal:")
02336    {
02337       std::cerr << std::endl
02338                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
02339                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02340                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02341 
02342       exit(1);   
02343    }
02344 
02345    file >> evaluationGoal;
02346 
02347    // Gradient norm goal
02348 
02349    file >> word;
02350 
02351    if(word != "GradientNormGoal:")
02352    {
02353       std::cerr << std::endl
02354                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
02355                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl
02356                 << "Unknown file format."  << std::endl;
02357 
02358       exit(1);   
02359    }
02360 
02361    file >> gradientNormGoal;
02362 
02363    // Maximum time
02364 
02365    file >> word;
02366 
02367    if(word != "MaximumTime:")
02368    {
02369       std::cerr << std::endl
02370                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
02371                 << "void load(char*) method." << std::endl

02373

02423

02595 
02596 // void resizeTrainingHistory(int) method
02597 
02613 
02614 void QuasiNewtonMethod::resizeTrainingHistory(int newSize)
02615 {
02616    // Free parameters history matrix
02617 
02618    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
02619    {
02620       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02621                                         
02622       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02623                                    
02624       freeParametersHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
02625    }
02626 
02627    // Free parameters norm history vector
02628 
02629    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
02630    {
02631       freeParametersNormHistory.resize(newSize);
02632    }
02633 
02634    // Evaluation history vector
02635 
02636    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
02637    {
02638       evaluationHistory.resize(newSize);
02639    }
02640 
02641    // Gradient history matrix
02642 
02643    if(reserveGradientHistory)
02644    {
02645       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02646                                         
02647       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02648 
02649       gradientHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
02650    }
02651  
02652    // Gradient norm training history vector
02653 
02654    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
02655    {
02656       gradientNormHistory.resize(newSize);
02657    }
02658 
02659    // Elapsed time history vector
02660 
02661    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
02662    {
02663       elapsedTimeHistory.resize(newSize);
02664    }
02665 
02666    // Training direction history matrix
02667 
02668    if(reserveTrainingDirectionHistory)
02669    {
02670       MultilayerPerceptron* multilayerPerceptron = objectiveFunctional->getMultilayerPerceptron();
02671                                         
02672       int numberOfFreeParameters = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfFreeParameters();
02673 
02674       trainingDirectionHistory.resize(newSize, numberOfFreeParameters);
02675    }
02676    
02677    // Training rate history vector
02678 
02679    if(reserveTrainingRateHistory)
02680    {
02681       trainingRateHistory.resize(newSize);
02682    }
02683 }
02684 
02685 
02686 // void saveTrainingHistory(char*) method
02687 
02691 
02692 void QuasiNewtonMethod::saveTrainingHistory(char* filename)
02693 
02694 {
02695    std::fstream file; 
02696 
02697    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
02698 
02699    // Write file header 
02700 
02701    if(!file.is_open())
02702    {
02703       std::cerr << std::endl 
02704                 << "Flood Error: QuasiNewtonMethod class." << std::endl
02705                 << "void saveTrainingHistory(char*) method." << std::endl
02706                 << "Cannot open training history data file." << std::endl
02707                 << std::endl;
02708 
02709       exit(1);
02710    }
02711    else
02712    {
02713       if(display)
02714       {
02715          std::cout << std::endl 
02716                    << "Saving training history to data file..." << std::endl;
02717       }
02718    }
02719 
02720    // Write file header
02721 
02722    file << "% Flood Neural Network. Quasi-Newton Method Training History." << std::endl;
02723 
02724    // Write file data
02725 
02726    if(reserveElapsedTimeHistory)
02727    {
02728       file << "ElapsedTimeHistory:" << std::endl;
02729       file << elapsedTimeHistory << std::endl;      
02730    }
02731    if(reserveFreeParametersHistory)
02732    {
02733       file << "FreeParametersHistory:" << std::endl;
02734       file << freeParametersHistory << std::endl;      
02735    }
02736    if(reserveFreeParametersNormHistory)
02737    {
02738       file << "FreeParametersNormHistory:" << std::endl;
02739       file << freeParametersHistory << std::endl;      
02740    }
02741    if(reserveEvaluationHistory)
02742    {
02743       file << "EvaluationHistory:" << std::endl;
02744       file << evaluationHistory << std::endl;      
02745    }
02746    if(reserveGradientHistory)
02747    {
02748       file << "GradientHistory:" << std::endl;
02749       file << gradientHistory << std::endl;      
02750    }
02751    if(reserveGradientNormHistory)
02752    {
02753       file << "GradientNormHistory:" << std::endl;
02754       file << gradientNormHistory << std::endl;      
02755    }
02756    if(reserveTrainingDirectionHistory)
02757    {
02758       file << "TrainingDirectionHistory:" << std::endl;
02759       file << trainingDirectionHistory << std::endl;      
02760    }
02761    if(reserveTrainingDirectionNormHistory)
02762    {
02763       file << "TrainingDirectionNormHistory:" << std::endl;
02764       file << trainingDirectionNormHistory << std::endl;      
02765    }
02766    if(reserveTrainingRateHistory)
02767    {
02768       file << "TrainingRateHistory:" << std::endl;
02769       file << trainingRateHistory << std::endl;      
02770    }
02771 
02772    file.close();     
02773      
02774 }
02775 
02776 }
